content-library.primer_content: It's just human nature to experience bias in the way we see others. For example, if a team memeber recently under-performed you may be tempted to let the unfairly influence your view of their entire year. Remember to take a step back and ensure you are being fair as you evaluate team members.
content-library.reflection_help_text: Take a moment to make a quick note about your team meetings. What will you do differently now that you have more information to in crease incluseive behaviors or reduce bias related to this topic?

content-library.primer_content: An inclusive leadership style usually results in more team members sharing diverse thought-leadership, which leads to increased employment productivity and innovation.
